title: Devinuwara A House and 86 p land sale
details:
This property is situated near the Mahinda Rajapakse College at Devinuwara, behind the university of Matara.
750 meters from the Matara-Kataragama road. This is a high land. The ocean can be seen on the house compounds. Trees and shady land.
There are two houses. A big and small.
An ideal place for a tourist villa or bungalow.
Good ocean panaroma
